struct tzdb;

The class {{tt|tzdb}} represents a copy of the [https://www.iana.org/time-zones IANA time zone database]. Users cannot construct a {{tt|tzdb}} and can only obtain read-only access to one via the free functions {{lc|std::chrono::get_tzdb_list}} and {{lc|std::chrono::get_tzdb}}.

===Member objects===
{{dsc begin}}
{{dsc hitem|Member object|Description}}
{{dsc|{{tt|version}}|A {{lc|std::string}} that contains the version of the database}}
{{dsc|{{tt|zones}}|A sorted {{c|std::vector&lt;std::chrono::time_zone&gt;}} containing description of time zones}}
{{dsc|{{tt|links}}|A sorted {{c|std::vector&lt;std::chrono::time_zone_link&gt;}} containing description of alternative names of time zones (links)}}
{{dsc|{{tt|leap_seconds}}|A sorted {{c|std::vector&lt;std::chrono::leap_second&gt;}} containing description of leap seconds}}
{{dsc end}}
